analysis.Summary: Vue 3 single-file component that renders a card displaying basic information (name, description, status) about a governance initiative passed in via props.
analysis.Purpose: Serve as a reusable presentational block within the governance module to show individual initiative details in list or grid views.

Components.name: CardInitiativeItem
Components.role: Main component that accepts an `initiative` object prop and renders its fields in a styled card layout.

Functions.name: defineProps
Functions.description: Vue Composition API helper for declaring component props in `<script setup>`.

analysis.Usage: Imported into parent views or list components within the governance feature (e.g., initiative list) and used in a `v-for` loop or individually to display initiative details.
Notes: Uses `<script setup>` syntaxâ€”no additional script logic beyond prop declaration.
No dedicated `<style>` block included here; styling must come from global or parent CSS.
Only displays three fields; if initiatives evolve, additional props or slots may be needed.
